channel.title: misc on bigelectrons
channel.description: Recent content in misc on bigelectrons

item.title: Operational Cost comparision between a HEV and BEV
item.description: Recently I had to make a choice of which new car to get so that I can replace my old Diesel car. Given the industry shift to electric vehicles, it is definitely an unfortunate time to buy. In this blog, I wanted to present my simple rational that helped me make my decision. NOTE: I cannot vouch for the correctness, and I'm not liable if you use this article for basing your purchase decision!

item.title: Vacation in Paris
item.description: I just came back from my vacation in Paris. Just thought of writing down my experience and what I did with my family while in Paris. How to Reach Paris We decided that we will drive to Paris. From where we are located, it just takes us a 6 to 7-Hour drive by car. On the way, there are plenty of rest places with sufficient facilities for food. Where to Stay There are tons and tons of options.
